name: Bullet list
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='ul';exports.name='Bullet list';exports.version=1;exports.icon='fa far fa-list';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=6;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false;widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('li');for(var el of elements)arr.push(el.children[0].innerHTML);return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('li').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html='
    • '.format(id);if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('ul').append(html);var li=element.find('li[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));li[0].$newbie=true;li.trigger('click')};element.on('click','li',function(){var li=$(this);widget.edit(li.find('div'),{backslashremove:true,parent:li},function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=li[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete li[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',li);if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,li)}else{li.remove();widget.change('remove',li);widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push('
  • {1}
    • '.format(widget.makeid(),item));if(builder.length)element.find('ul').html(builder.join(''))};

name: Callout
author: Total.js

name: Counter
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='counter';exports.name='Counter';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-calculator';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false,template='{1}{2}{3}';widget.save=function(){var rows=element.find('tbody').find('tr');var arr=[];for(var row of rows){var cols=$(row).find('td');var val=$(cols[1]);arr.push({name:cols[0].innerHTML,value:val.find('.value').html(),unit:val.find('.unit').html()})}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('tbody').find('tr').length)widget.remove()};var recount=function(){var arr=element.find('tbody').find('.value');var count=0;for(var el of arr){var num=$(el).text().trim();switch(num.charAt(0)){case'-':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count-num;break;case'*':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count*num;break;case'/':num=num.substring(1).parseFloat();count=count/num;break;default:count+=num.parseFloat();break}}element.find('tfoot').find('.value').html(count+'')};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template.format(id,'','','h');if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('tbody').append(html);var tr=element.find('tr[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));var col=tr.find('.name');col[0].$newbie=true;col.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.add',function(){setTimeout(append,100)});element.on('click','.edit',function(){var el=$(this);var opt={};opt.endwithtab=true;widget.edit(el,opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=el[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete el[0].$newbie;var name=el.attrd('id');if(name==='value')recount();if(name==='unit')element.find('.unit').text(response.text);response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',el.closest('tr'));if(name==='name'||response.key===9){setTimeout(()=>el.next().find('.value').trigger('click'),100);return}if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,el.closest('tr'))}else{el.closest('tr').remove();widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template.format(widget.makeid(),item.name,item.value,item.unit));if(builder.length){element.find('tbody').append(builder.join(''));recount()}};
css: .wcounter{position:relative;margin-bottom:5px}.wcounter table{margin:5px 0 0;padding:0;width:100%}.wcounter table td{border:1px solid #D0D0D0;padding:6px 10px}.wcounter table td.number{text-align:right;width:150px;font-family:Menlo,Consolas,monospace;font-size:14px}.wcounter table td.number .unit{margin-left:5px;color:#999;font-size:12px}.wcounter table tfoot td.number{background-color:#F0F0F0}.wcounter .add{position:absolute;right:-20px;top:8px;color:#68B25B;cursor:pointer}.readonly .wcounter .add{display:none}
html: 0h

name: Credentials
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='credentials';exports.name='Credentials';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-key';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false,template=Tangular.compile('{{ name | raw}}
{{ password | raw}}
**************
');widget.save=function(){var rows=element.find('tr');var arr=[];for(var row of rows){row=$(row);var obj={};obj.id=row.attrd('id');obj.name=row.find('.name').html();obj.password=row.find('.value').html();arr.push(obj)}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('tbody').find('tr').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template({id:id});if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('tbody').append(html);var tr=element.find('tr[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));var col=tr.find('.name');col[0].$newbie=true;col.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.add',function(){if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(append,100)});element.on('click','.camouflage',function(){var el=$(this).closest('td').rclass('secret');if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(()=>el.find('.edit').trigger('click'),50)});element.on('click','.edit',function(){var el=$(this);el.closest('td').rclass('secret');if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.endwithtab=true;widget.edit(el,opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=el[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete el[0].$newbie;var name=el.attrd('id');if(name==='password')el.closest('td').aclass('secret');response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',el.closest('tr'));if(name==='name'){setTimeout(()=>el.next().find('.value').trigger('click'),100);return}if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,el.closest('tr'))}else{el.closest('tr').remove();widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template(item));builder.length&&element.find('tbody').html(builder.join(''))};
css: .wcredentials{position:relative}.wcredentials table{margin:5px 0 10px;padding:0;width:100%}.wcredentials table td{border:1px solid #D0D0D0;padding:6px 10px;vertical-align:top}.wcredentials table td.password{width:68%;font-family:Menlo,Consolas,monospace;font-size:14px;background-color:#F0F0F0}.wcredentials table .camouflage{display:none}.wcredentials table .secret .value{display:none}.wcredentials table .secret .camouflage{display:block;cursor:pointer}.wcredentials table .secret .camouflage i{margin-right:7px}.wcredentials .add{position:absolute;right:-20px;top:8px;color:#68B25B;cursor:pointer}.readonly .add{display:none}

name: Files
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='files';exports.name='Files';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-upload';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=5;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template='
{3}{2}',isnew=false,check=function(){if(!element.find('.files').find('> .file').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(file){var id=widget.makeid();var mb=(file.size/1024/1024).floor(1);var html=template.format(id,file.url,file.name.encode(),mb+' MB');element.find('.files').append(html)};var upload=function(){var opt={};opt.multiple=true;opt.callback=function(files){for(var file of files)append(file)};widget.upload(opt)};widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('.file');for(var el of elements){el=$(el);var obj={};obj.id=el.attrd('id');obj.url=el.find('a').attr('href');obj.size=el.find('.size').text();obj.name=el.find('.edit').html();obj.ext=el.attrd('ext');arr.push(obj)}return{items:arr}};element.on('click','.add',function(){if(!widget.readonly)setTimeout(upload,100)});element.on('click','.remove',function(e){e.preventDefault();$(this).closest('.file').remove()});widget.newbie&&upload();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template.format(item.id,item.url,item.name,item.size,item.ext));builder.length&&element.find('.files').html(builder.join(''))};

name: Image
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='image';exports.name='Image';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-image';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={};exports.sortindex=1;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template='',upload=function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var opt={};opt.accept='image/*';opt.callback=function(files){var file=files[0];element.find('.image').html(template.format(file.url,file.name));widget.update('change')};widget.upload(opt)};widget.save=function(){var img=element.find('img');var alt=element.find('.alt');return{url:img.attr('src'),name:img.attr('alt'),alt:alt.html()}};element.on('click','.alt',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;widget.edit(this,{},function(response){if(response.text){widget.change();widget.end(response.key)}})});element.on('click','.empty',upload);widget.newbie&&setTimeout(upload,100);config.url&&element.find('.image').html(template.format(config.url,config.name))};

name: Numbered list
author: Total.js
js:
exports.id='ol';exports.name='Numbered list';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-list-ol';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=6;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var isnew=false;widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('li');for(var el of elements)arr.push(el.children[0].innerHTML);return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('li').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html='
    • '.format(id);if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('ol').append(html);var li=element.find('li[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));li[0].$newbie=true;li.trigger('click')};element.on('click','li',function(){var li=$(this);widget.edit(li.find('div'),{backslashremove:true,parent:li},function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=li[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete li[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',li);if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,li)}else{li.remove();widget.change('remove',li);widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push('
  • {1}
    • '.format(widget.makeid(),item));if(builder.length)element.find('ol').html(builder.join(''))};

name: Tasks
author: Total.js
js: exports.id='tasks';exports.name='Tasks';exports.version=1;exports.icon='far fa-check-square';exports.author='Total.js';exports.version='1';exports.config={items:[]};exports.sortindex=7;exports.make=function(widget,config,element){var template=Tangular.compile('');var isnew=false,isend=false;widget.save=function(){var arr=[],elements=element.find('figure');for(var el of elements){el=$(el);arr.push({id:el.attrd('id'),name:el.find('.text').html(),checked:el.hclass('checked')})}return{items:arr}};var check=function(){if(!element.find('figure').length)widget.remove()};var append=function(el){var id=widget.makeid();var html=template({id:id,checked:false,name:''});if(el)el.after(html);else element.find('.wtasks-items').append(html);var figure=element.find('figure[data-id="{0}"]'.format(id));figure[0].$newbie=true;figure.trigger('click')};element.on('click','.checkbox',function(e){e.preventDefault();e.stopPropagation();if(!config.readonly||config.readonly===1){var figure=$(this).parent();figure.tclass('checked');widget.change('update',figure)}});element.on('click','figure',function(){if(widget.readonly)return;var figure=$(this);var opt={};opt.backslashremove=true;opt.parent=figure;opt.cursor=isend?'end':'beg';widget.edit(figure.find('div'),opt,function(response){if(response.text){var newbie=figure[0].$newbie;if(newbie)delete figure[0].$newbie;response.change&&widget.change(newbie?'insert':'update',figure);if(response.key===13||response.key===8)setTimeout(append,100,figure);else if(response.key===9){var n=figure.next();if(n.length){isend=true;setTimeout(()=>n.trigger('click'),100)}}}else{figure.remove();widget.change('remove',figure);widget.end()}check()})});widget.newbie&&append();var builder=[];for(var item of config.items)builder.push(template(item));if(builder.length)element.find('.wtasks-items').html(builder.join(''))};
css: .wtasks figure{padding:0;margin:0 0 3px;min-height:20px;display:block}.wtasks figure .checkbox{width:20px;height:20px;border:1px solid #D0D0D0;line-height:18px;color:#FFF;text-align:center;float:left;border-radius:var(--radius);margin:1px 0 0;font-size:12px}.wtasks figure .checkbox i{visibility:hidden}.wtasks figure .text{margin-left:30px}.wtasks figure.checked .checkbox{background-color:var(--color);border-color:var(--color)}.wtasks figure.checked .checkbox i{visibility:visible}
